task.summary: Default task
created 'home' controller
added home/index view based on Twitter Bootstrap
changed the root index to home/index
introduced main layout
fixed the home link using gsp tags
created a model: musashino.model.Location
testing Google Map API
added a method: musashino.model.Location.setLatLngFromGoogleMaps
added a spec to Location: "the latitude and longitude should be set before insert/update"
added a shared template for text input
added a test case to Location: "invalid address should be a validation error"
added logic to register a location with validation
added musashino.js
added location list to home/index
updated the home page to show locations when validation failed
added error messages
added bootstrap images
added a feature to delete a location
fixed the problem of accessing Google Map by URL-encoding the address
added a controller and view: musashino.controller.LocationController
updated the location/show view to show the location
added a model: musashino.model.Note
added a note form to location/show
added a test class: musashino.model.NoteSpec
added a markdown parser
added an action: musashino.controller.LocationController#addNote
added note list to location/show
added sorting and last-update-timestamp to the note list
updated the note display to show markdown html correctly (still it involves XSS issues)
fixed the XSS problem in notes
added a feature to delete a note

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: added a feature to delete a note
